# Button Component

Button to be used with `react-form-elements`

Basic usage:

```jsx static
import React from 'react'
import { Button } from 'react-form-elements'

<Button>Press Me</Button>
// or
<Button onClick={(e) => {
  e.preventDefault()
  // do something else
}}> Click Me </Button>
```

```jsx
let Button = require('./index.js').default;
<Button>Push Me</Button>
```

```jsx
let Button = require('./index.js').default;

;
<Button onClick={(e) => {
  e.preventDefault()
  // do something else
}}> Click Me </Button>
```
